author: hibou
msg: - add a test project to reproduce the bug
- fix the propagation of the update event

author: jplevyak
msg: TS-50, TS-54: this patch fully supports FreeBSD/KQUEUE without libev.
It also makes edge triggering and level triggering of events fully orthogonal
for USE_EPOLL and USE_KQUEUE so that the differences can be examined.
libev is now optional on FreeBSD and likely could be made optional on OSX.
Currently the default remains edge triggering.

author: hibou
msg: Don't use the deprecated API that may produce an incorrect URL under Windows

author: hlship
msg: TAP5-979: Form component should be more careful with the validation tracker to ensure that a session is not created unless needed
